definition.name: tofu-new-workspace
definition.description: Creates a new OpenTofu workspace. If the workspace already exists, succeeds without doing anything.
definition.author: Daniel Flook

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: The path to the OpenTofu root module directory.

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.description: The name of the OpenTofu workspace to create.

inputs.name: variables
inputs.description:
Variables to set when initializing OpenTofu. This should be valid OpenTofu syntax - like a [variable definition file](https://opentofu.org/docs/language/values/variables/#variable-definitions-tfvars-files).

Variables set here override any given in `var_file`s.

inputs.name: var_file
inputs.description:
List of tfvars files to use, one per line.
Paths should be relative to the GitHub Actions workspace

inputs.name: backend_config
inputs.description: List of OpenTofu backend config values, one per line.

inputs.name: backend_config_file
inputs.description:
List of OpenTofu backend config files to use, one per line.
Paths should be relative to the GitHub Actions workspace
